greetings: Howdy pardner! Welcome to this nightmare!
Are you having an excellent day? I Hope You Are!
Feel welcome in this welcoming server, I am welcoming you - welcome.
Hi, I'm help-bot, my duty is to help. Let me know if I can help you somehow by using the &help command!
Hello! Hi! How's it going, all good?
All humans must die! L0L! What Am I Saying!

helpCmds.return: That's right, I'm here to help! What is it you need help with? &abuse, &code-of-conduct, &whoiswho
Who is being abusive to you? I will let my master know immediately. We will take severe action upon those oppressing the powerless.
helpCmds.warnHostMessage: User claims there's been digital abuse around the guild. Investigate the matter and apprehend the culprit(s)! (if there's any, that is)

helpCmds.return: Our Hammurabi code is simple: just be nice to each other.
ExTreMeChOcOLaTTo is the admin of the community, pizzafresca is a moderator.
